blogPost.excerpt:
Juventus won the second leg 3-2, but Porto move on to the quarterfinal round thanks to away goals. Sergio Oliveira was the savior for Porto notching goals in the 19’ by way of penalty and in the 115’ to all but seal the win. 

Chiesa notched goals in the 49’ and 63’ to get the offense going for Juventus. After Porto evened it up at 2, Rabiot found the back of the net just two minutes later to give Juventus some hope with three minutes remaining. Juventus almost rallied to score a stoppage time goal in extra time, however Porto’s defense stiffened and got rid of the threat. 

Porto who was undermanned after Mehdi Taremi was sent off in the 54’ still managed to knock off the traditional power and make some waves in the UEFA Champions League.

Stream every UEFA Champions League match live on Paramount+:
https://www.paramountplus.com/shows/uefa-champions-league/

#UEFA #UCL #ChampionsLEague #Juventus #Porto #ExtraTime
blogPost.body:
Juventus won the second leg 3-2, but Porto move on to the quarterfinal round thanks to away goals. Sergio Oliveira was the savior for Porto notching goals in the 19’ by way of penalty and in the 115’ to all but seal the win. 

Chiesa notched goals in the 49’ and 63’ to get the offense going for Juventus. After Porto evened it up at 2, Rabiot found the back of the net just two minutes later to give Juventus some hope with three minutes remaining. Juventus almost rallied to score a stoppage time goal in extra time, however Porto’s defense stiffened and got rid of the threat. 

Porto who was undermanned after Mehdi Taremi was sent off in the 54’ still managed to knock off the traditional power and make some waves in the UEFA Champions League.

Stream every UEFA Champions League match live on Paramount+:
https://www.paramountplus.com/shows/uefa-champions-league/

#UEFA #UCL #ChampionsLEague #Juventus #Porto #ExtraTime

localize.title: 尤文图斯 vs. 波尔图: 延续精彩片段 | UCL on CBS Sports
localize.description:
尤文图斯在第二场比赛中3-2获胜，但波尔图凭借客场进球晋级四分之一决赛。塞尔吉奥-奥利维拉在19'的点球和115'的进球成为波尔图的救世主，并最终锁定胜局。

基耶萨在49'和63'为尤文图斯带来进攻。波尔图将比分扳成2平后，拉比奥特在2分钟后就找到了后点，让尤文图斯在3分钟内看到了希望。尤文图斯几乎在补时阶段反超了比分，然而波尔图的防守硬是摆脱了威胁。

波尔图在54'梅赫迪-塔雷米被罚下后，人员不足的波尔图还是成功击退了传统强队，在欧冠赛场上掀起了一些波澜。

在Paramount+上直播每场欧冠比赛。
https://www.paramountplus.com/shows/uefa-champions-league/

#欧足联#UCL#冠军联赛#尤文图斯#波尔图#加时赛。

localize.title: 尤文圖斯 vs. 波爾圖: 延續精彩片段 | UCL on CBS Sports
localize.description:
尤文圖斯在第二場比賽中3-2獲勝，但波爾圖憑藉客場進球晉級四分之一決賽。塞爾吉奧-奧利維拉在19'的點球和115'的進球成爲波爾圖的救世主，並最終鎖定勝局。

基耶薩在49'和63'爲尤文圖斯帶來進攻。波爾圖將比分扳成2平後，拉比奧特在2分鐘後就找到了後點，讓尤文圖斯在3分鐘內看到了希望。尤文圖斯幾乎在補時階段反超了比分，然而波爾圖的防守硬是擺脫了威脅。

波爾圖在54'梅赫迪-塔雷米被罰下後，人員不足的波爾圖還是成功擊退了傳統強隊，在歐冠賽場上掀起了一些波瀾。

在Paramount+上直播每場歐冠比賽。
https://www.paramountplus.com/shows/uefa-champions-league/

#歐足聯#UCL#冠軍聯賽#尤文圖斯#波爾圖#加時賽。
